data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Saran hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Saran, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Saran, Bihar, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Saran, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
the county of Saran has (about) 43,471 people who know Jesus, 47,950 people who know about him culturally, and 3,860,479 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, help every believer in Saran, Bihar, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Sonar Tejania people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Saran, Bihar, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 43,471 believers in the county of Saran the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 43,471 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

location.name: Saran
location.people_groups_list: Abdul, Bhar, Tamboli (Muslim traditions), Rajput Kinwar, Dusadh (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Abdul (35,000), Bhar (1,982,000), Tamboli (Muslim traditions) (149,000), Rajput Kinwar (29,000), Dusadh (Hindu traditions) (5,586,000)
